com.buession.redis.client.jedis.operations

类 AbstractConnectionOperations<C extends JedisRedisClient>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.buession.redis.client.operations.AbstractRedisOperations<C>
      • com.buession.redis.client.jedis.operations.AbstractJedisRedisOperations<C>
        • com.buession.redis.client.jedis.operations.AbstractConnectionOperations<C>
  • 类型参数:
    C - Redis Client JedisRedisClient
    所有已实现的接口:
    JedisRedisOperations, ConnectionOperations, RedisOperations, ConnectionCommands, RedisCommands
    直接已知子类:
    JedisClusterConnectionOperations, JedisConnectionOperations, JedisSentinelConnectionOperations

    public abstract class AbstractConnectionOperations<C extends JedisRedisClient>
extends AbstractJedisRedisOperations<C>
implements ConnectionOperations
    Jedis 连接命令操作抽象类
    从以下版本开始:
    2.0.0
    作者:
    Yong.Teng

      • auth

        public com.buession.lang.Status auth(byte[] user,
                                     byte[] password)
        从接口复制的说明: ConnectionCommands
        通过密码进行认证

        详情说明 http://redisdoc.com/client_and_server/auth.html

        指定者:
        auth 在接口中 ConnectionCommands
        参数:
        user - 用户账号
        password - 密码
        返回:
        密码匹配时返回 Status.SUCCESS；否则，返回 Status.FAILURE
